Class KryoSerializationSession

com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater

All Implemented Interfaces:
SilentTryTrait, TryTrait, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, Versioned, Flushable, Receiver, Transmitter, Named, NamedObject, SerializationSession, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public final class KryoSerializationSession extends BaseRepeater implements Named, SerializationSession
An implementation of SerializationSession using Kryo.

jonathanl (shibo)

      public void flush​(LengthOfTime maximumWaitTime)

      Flushes the object waiting not more than the give duration for this to occur.
      Specified by:
      flush in interface Flushable
      Parameters:
      maximumWaitTime - The amount of time to wait before giving up on flushing. To achieve a blocking flush, simply pass in LengthOfTime.MAXIMUM as the wait time, or call Flushable.flush().
